question: In Mrs. Garcia's class of 117 students, 40% of the class are volleyball players. Out of the remaining class, 38% of the students are choir members or part of robotics club members. These 3 groups of students will need to leave early today to travel to an away tournament. How many students are leaving early?
answer:
40% of the 117 student class are volleyball players so that's 0.4*117 = <<0.4*117=46>>46 students
There are 117 students and 46 are volleyball players so that leaves 117-46 = <<117-46=71>>71 students
38% of the remaining 71 students are part of robotics club members or choir members so that's 0.38*71 = <<0.38*71=26>>26 students
46 students are volleyball players and 26 are part of robotics club members/choir members so 46+26 = <<46+26=73>>73 students will be leaving early
#### 73
